mapper.select: SELECT s.subject_no subjectNo ,t.teacher_name teacherName ,s.admin_id adminId ,s.subject_name subjectName ,s.subject_student_max subjectStudentMax ,s.subject_info subjectInfo ,s.subject_start_date subjectStartDate ,s.subject_finish_date subjectFinishDate ,s.subject_start_time subjectStartTime ,s.subject_end_time subjectEndTime ,s.create_date createDate ,s.update_date updateDate FROM subject AS s LEFT JOIN teacher AS t ON s.teacher_id = t.member_id ORDER BY create_date DESC LIMIT #{startRow}, #{rowPerPage}

SELECT s.subject_no subjectNo ,s.teacher_id teacherId ,t.teacher_name teacherName ,s.admin_id adminId ,s.subject_name subjectName ,s.subject_student_max subjectStudentMax ,s.subject_info subjectInfo ,s.subject_start_date subjectStartDate ,s.subject_finish_date subjectFinishDate ,s.subject_start_time subjectStartTime ,s.subject_end_time subjectEndTime FROM subject AS s LEFT JOIN teacher AS t ON s.teacher_id = t.member_id WHERE subject_no = #{subjectNo}
